favourite.article: The Lord shall get the glory!
Now is the time to praise Him, Yes now, at any cost! Lord, we praise You!
Amazing! Surely through our praises, the enemy is defeated and our Lord is glorified!
Now is the time to praise Him!!

Now is the time to praise our ascended Lord! The enemies be defeated through the shout of victory! Lets declare by the word of our testimony! Lets open our mouth and declare openly His word through our prophesying! AMEN!
Praise the Lord, we are God's chosen fools, and we should never shut our mouth, we will stand up and prophesy!
